transcript:
structor. For a long time he could not utter a word, so that the Rhetor had to repeat his ques- tion. 
"Yes ... I ... I ... desire regeneration," Pierre uttered with difficulty. 
"Very well," said Smolyaninov, and went on at once: "Have you any idea of the means by which our holy Order will help you to reach your aim?" said he quietly and quickly. 
"I ... hope ... for guidance . . . help ... in regeneration," said Pierre, with a trembling voice and some difficulty in utterance due to his excite
